column1: Uchi////Let me preface this review by saying
column2: Uchi is a fusion sushi restaurant. Their happy hour menu is full of flavor that will appeal to everyone. We ordered a few appetizers
column4: an escolar plate called walu walu
column5: the yellowtail and pear plate called machi cure
column7: and lastly we received a free order of edamame considering a mistake in our sashimi order. All of these starters had definition and flavor
column8: but were not my cup of tea.
